body_html: @MatteoGlarey I "solved" the problem by building tensor infos from the 3 individual Tensors that make up a SparseTensor (*/indices, */values, */shape) and then save the model using these tensor infos. The downside is that when the model is being deployed using Tensorflow Serving, the value to be scored has to be supplied in that same format, meaning as incides/values/shape individually.
